docs.lead_paragraph: High-grade euro zone government bond yields edged lower on Monday on expectations the ECB will this week maintain its ultra-loose monetary policy stance, while further headlines around French elections kept that country's bonds on the boil.

docs.lead_paragraph: The bloc of European centre-right parties stripped Jacek Saryusz-Wolski of his vice presidency of the group on Monday after the Polish politician accepted Warsaw's nomination to run against fellow-Pole Donald Tusk as chair of EU summit meetings.
